name: Islands Cruise
description:
Find differences as you compete with other players in real time.  Travel across fabulous islands and unlock fun characters.

ITEM RESTORATION
Explore the depths of the sea to come across treasures. There are hundreds of finds waiting for you to restore them and add them to your collection, earning rewards.

EXCITING EVENTS
Join a variety of events, climb the rankings, and get a taste of glory and prizes!

Adventure awaits!
